name: Heartpiercer
effect: 1/round, you can activate this mod with a Quick Action. Your next attack with this weapon allows you to lunge two spaces towards your attack target (ignoring reactions) and adds +2 Knockback. If the target collides with a wall, object, or character, the target must pass a hull save or take 1d6 kinetic damage and become prone.
description: Secondary thrusters and experimental chemical catalysts allow pilots to leverage forward momentum with their weapon attacks into a devastating charge. Pilots of Afenatene-pattern Akrafena are cleared to use this mod, as it exposes the pilot to great risk of counter-attack.
